original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyaṁ bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṁ.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁sattarasa vagg iyaṃ ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās esu ṃ
▁so ▁bhikkhu ▁u tt anto ▁an assā sak o ▁kāl amakāsi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
“kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hā ses s antīti ▁pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsethā”ti?
analyzed: ▁saccaṃ ▁kira ▁tumhe ▁bhikkhave ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās e thāti

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessatha.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁tumhe ▁mogh apuris ā ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās e ssa tha

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
upasampanno upasampannaṁ hasādhippāyo kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁upasampann asaññī ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Upasampanne vematiko aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁ve mati ko ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁anupasampann asaññī ▁aṃguli pat odak ena ▁ hās eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Anupasampannaṁ kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
